name: BuildYourOwn-WinterWonderland
description:
https://www.coregames.com/games/0fefe2/buildyourown-winterwonderland

Welcome to Winter Wonderland!

We want to wish everyone a fantastic 2021!

Build your own Winter Wonderland with your friends, take a ride in the carousel, build a snowman or a frosty fort.

We want to thank everyone who has been a big contributor to Community Content. Without you this wouldn't have been possible!

Come have a chat with us ingame or on our discord and enjoy the game!

Creators:

Staypunny & Descendent
